SEARCH

Class CD

java.lang.Object
CD
public class CD extends Object
Represents a CD in the library system. Each CD has an ID, title, artist, and borrowing status. Provides methods to borrow, return, and serialize/deserialize for file storage.
Version:
1.0
Author:
hoor

  • Constructor Details

    • CD

      public CD(String id, String title, String artist)
      Constructs a new CD with the given details.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the CD
      title - the title of the CD
      artist - the artist of the CD

  • Method Details

    • borrow

      public void borrow(String memberId)
      Marks the CD as borrowed by a member. Sets the due date to 7 days from today.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the ID of the member borrowing the CD

    • returnCD

      public void returnCD()
      Marks the CD as returned. Resets borrowed status, due date, and borrower ID.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Gets the CD's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      the CD ID

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Gets the CD's title.
      Returns:
      the CD title

    • getArtist

      public String getArtist()
      Gets the CD's artist.
      Returns:
      the CD artist

    • isBorrowed

      public boolean isBorrowed()
      Checks if the CD is currently borrowed.
      Returns:
      true if borrowed, false otherwise

    • getBorrowedBy

      public String getBorrowedBy()
      Gets the ID of the member who borrowed the CD.
      Returns:
      the member ID, or null if not borrowed

    • getDueDate

      public LocalDate getDueDate()
      Gets the due date for returning the CD.
      Returns:
      the due date, or null if not borrowed

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the CD suitable for saving to a file. Format: id,title,artist,status where status is either "available" or "borrowed:memberId".
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      formatted string with CD details

    • fromString

      public static CD fromString(String line)
      Creates a CD object from a string record. Expected format: id,title,artist,status where status is either "available" or "borrowed:memberId".
      Parameters:
      line - the string record
      Returns:
      a CD object parsed from the string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the record format is invalid

    • setDueDate

      public void setDueDate(LocalDate dueDate)
      Sets a custom due date for the CD.
      Parameters:
      dueDate - the new due date

    • setBorrowedBy

      public void setBorrowedBy(String memberId)
      Sets the ID of the member who borrowed the CD. Useful for testing or manual overrides.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member ID
